messages.subject: Unjobbing for everyone
messages.msgSnippet: For those that don t have land or even the desire to work from sun up to sundown to eat , there is a way to Unjob after a set period of time, using economic
messages.messageBody:
For those that don't have land or even the desire to work from sun up to
sundown to eat <g>, there is a way to Unjob after a set period of time,
using economic principles instead of back to nature principles to achieve
it. My husband and I followed this book and were able to Unjob and get a
REAL life back in less than a year...great stuff. It's also reviewed on
the whywork site that was mentioned in an earlier post...


Your Money or Your Life
by Joe Dominguez and Vicki Robin


Theresa
CA Unschooling parent

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
